# indexisinlist
*Python3 module to check if an index exists on a list.*

## Installation
### Install with pip
```
pip3 install -U indexisinlist
```

## Usage
```
In [1]: import indexisinlist

In [2]: indexisinlist.index_is_in_list(list_=[1, 6, 4], index=1)
                                                  
Out[2]: True
```
